---
description: D3 platform-specific tool and configuration mappings for Cursor. Read this before executing D3 commands or skills.
alwaysApply: false
---
# D3 Platform Reference

## Tool Mapping
| Reference | Tool |
|---|---|
| read tool | `read` |
| write tool | `edit` |
| search tool | `search` |
| glob tool | `search` |
| shell tool | `execute` |

## Skill Invocation
To invoke a skill, use this syntax:
```
@<skill-name> <arguments>
```

## Template References
D3 template files are located at:
```
.cursor/rules/d3/d3-templates/references
```
